wikitext.*:
'''''Ambarmenië''''' is [[Quenya]] for "the way of the world", which is, the conditions in which the creatures lived within [[ambar#Ambar|Ambar]], the world. These conditions, being created by [[Ilúvatar]] himself, were fixed and could not be altered by the creatures themselves.<ref>{{NM|P2xi}}, p. 226</ref>

==Etymology==
The term is clearly a combination of ''[[ambar#Ambar|Ambar]]'' ("the World") + gerund of ''[[men-]]'' ("to go, proceed, move").<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-2691113183.html|articlename=Q. ''Ambarmenië'' pn.|website=Eldamo|accessed=19 January 2023}}</ref>
